Compiled for the vse of all such valiant worthies, and vertuously valerous souldiers, as vpon all iust occasions be ready to affront the enemies of God, our king, and country. By Ric. div.head: TO THE MAGNANIM OVSLY HEAR TED READER, to every heroicke spirit, of worthy Resolution, and whosoeuer is generously affected to Military Profession, and well deserving the name of a Souldier, and place in so honourable an employment.
div.p: Wisdome, valour and victorie attend ever their service for God, for Religion, for his Church, for their King and Country.
